step.command: $(MAKE) -C ${CCS_PROJECT_DIR} -f makefile_system_ccs_bootimage_gen OUTNAME=ethernetip_adapter_bridge_system PROFILE=${ConfigName} INDUSTRIAL_COMMUNICATIONS_SDK_PATH=${INDUSTRIAL_COMMUNICATIONS_SDK_PATH} CG_TOOL_ROOT=${CG_TOOL_ROOT} CCS_INSTALL_DIR=${CCS_INSTALL_DIR} CCS_IDE_MODE=${CCS_IDE_MODE}
